name: hysteria2-vpn-client
description: Cross-platform VPN client with Hysteria2 protocol support

scripts.build:ios: cd ios && xcodebuild -workspace Hysteria2VpnClient.xcworkspace -scheme Hysteria2VpnClient -configuration Release archive -archivePath Hysteria2VpnClient.xcarchive
scripts.build:ios:simulator: cd ios && xcodebuild -workspace Hysteria2VpnClient.xcworkspace -scheme Hysteria2VpnClient -configuration Release -sdk iphonesimulator -destination 'platform=iOS Simulator,name=iPhone 14' build
scripts.build:linux: cd linux && mkdir -p build && cd build && cmake .. && make -j$(nproc)
scripts.build:macos: cd macos && xcodebuild -project Hysteria2VpnClient.xcodeproj -scheme Hysteria2VpnClient -configuration Release archive -archivePath Hysteria2VpnClient.xcarchive
scripts.build:all: npm run build:android && npm run build:ios && npm run build:windows && npm run build:linux && npm run build:macos
scripts.clean:ios: cd ios && xcodebuild clean -workspace Hysteria2VpnClient.xcworkspace -scheme Hysteria2VpnClient
scripts.clean:macos: cd macos && xcodebuild clean -project Hysteria2VpnClient.xcodeproj -scheme Hysteria2VpnClient
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean:android && npm run clean:ios && npm run clean:windows && npm run clean:linux && npm run clean:macos

author: VPN Client Team
